Shadow Wing::

She went outside and was bombarded by scents and sights that she 
never thought possable. The sky was the brightest blue she had ever 
seen. The air carried so many different scents and smells. She moved 
around in beast mode and tested her new body.  She loped around the 
clearing and felt her new paws on the grass. It was like she had just 
been born again. She spread her wings. She lifts off the ground a few 
feets and feels the wind under her wings. She knew that it felt like 
to fly, or thought she did. It was like she was just set free. No 
cares or worries, she felt free.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Veratis wanted to keep her inside until she sniffed him. He knew 
that 
> newly formed protoforms tended to have a feral aspect about them. 
It 
> was to his advantage to let her out and see what she was capable 
> of. "Alright, you can go out but stay close I don't want you having 
> any problems with your new form." he led her to the door and let 
her 
> out. It was later in the day than he was used to. He needed some 
> rest. he couldn't rest though, not with Shadow Wing still 
adjusting. 
> He had to be awake in case anything happened to her.
>
